statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); cd "$dir" 2>/dev/null || cd ~; status=""; user=$(whoami); host=$(hostname -s); status+="${user}@${host}"; short_dir=$(echo "$dir" | sed "s|^$HOME|~|"); status+="  ${short_dir}"; if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -c core.useReplaceRefs=false branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "detached"); git_status=$(git -c core.useReplaceRefs=false status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$git_status" ]; then status+="  ${branch} [Â±]"; else status+="  ${branch}"; fi; fi; if [ -n "$DEVBOX_SHELL_ENABLED" ]; then status+="  [devbox]"; fi; time=$(date +%H:%M); status+="  ${time}"; printf "%s" "$status"
